findStrings.find:
\<\?php get_header\(\)\; \?\> \ \
\ \<\?php if \( have_posts\(\) \) \: while \( have_posts\(\) \) \: the_post\(\)\; \?\> \ \ \<\?php if \(get_option\('memoir_integration_single_top'\) \<\> '' \&\& get_option\('memoir_integrate_singletop_enable'\) \=\= 'on'\) echo\(get_option\('memoir_integration_single_top'\)\)\; \?\> \ \ \
\ \ \ \

\<\?php the_title\(\)\; \?\>\ \ \ \ \<\?php \$thumb \= ''\; \ \ \ \$width \= 135\; \ \ \ \$height \= 135\; \ \ \ \$classtext \= ''\; \ \ \ \$titletext \= get_the_title\(\)\; \ \ \ \$thumbnail \= get_thumbnail\(\$width\,\$height\,\$classtext\,\$titletext\,\$titletext\,false\,'Entry'\)\; \ \ \ \$thumb \= \$thumbnail\["thumb"\]\; \?\> \ \ \ \<\?php if\(\$thumb \<\> '' \&\& get_option\('memoir_thumbnails'\) \=\= 'on'\) \{ \?\> \ \ \ \ \
\ \ \ \ \ \<\?php print_thumbnail\(\$thumb\, \$thumbnail\["use_timthumb"\]\, \$titletext\, \$width\, \$height\, \$classtext\)\; \?\> \ \ \ \ \ \\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \<\!\-\- end \.post\-thumbnail \-\-\> \ \ \ \<\?php \} \?\> \ \ \ \<\?php \ \ \ \ echo apply_filters\('the_content'\,et_create_dropcaps\(get_the_content\(\)\)\)\; \ \ \ \?\> \ \ \ \<\?php wp_link_pages\(array\('before' \=\> '\\'\.esc_html__\('Pages'\,'Memoir'\)\.'\:\ '\, 'after' \=\> '\'\, 'next_or_number' \=\> 'number'\)\)\; \?\> \ \ \ \<\?php edit_post_link\(esc_html__\('Edit this page'\,'Memoir'\)\)\; \?\> \ \ \ \<\?php get_template_part\('includes/postinfo'\)\; \?\> \ \ \ \<\!\-\- end \.entry \-\-\> \ \ \<\?php if \(get_option\('memoir_integration_single_bottom'\) \<\> '' \&\& get_option\('memoir_integrate_singlebottom_enable'\) \=\= 'on'\) echo\(get_option\('memoir_integration_single_bottom'\)\)\; \?\> \ \ \<\?php if \(get_option\('memoir_468_enable'\) \=\= 'on'\) \{ \?\> \ \ \ \<\?php if\(get_option\('memoir_468_adsense'\) \<\> ''\) echo\(get_option\('memoir_468_adsense'\)\)\; \ \ \ else \{ \?\> \ \ \ \ \\\ \ \ \ \<\?php \} \?\> \ \ \<\?php \} \?\> \ \ \<\?php if \(get_option\('memoir_show_postcomments'\) \=\= 'on'\) comments_template\(''\, true\)\; \?\> \ \<\?php endwhile\; endif\; \?\> \ \ \<\!\-\- end \#main\-area \-\-\> \ \<\?php get_sidebar\(\)\; \?\> \<\?php get_footer\(\)\; \?\>
